mapper.select: select t.`id`, tv.`hoten`, tv.`ngaysinh`, t.`thuyenvienID`, t.`tenchungchiVAL`, t.`so`, t.`tungay`, ${jdbc.schema}.calCertExpDate(t.`denngay`) 'denngay', t.`ngaytao`, t.`nguoitaoId`, t.`ngaycapnhat`, t.`nguoicapnhatId`, lt.text 'tenchungchi', lt.textEn 'tenchungchiEn', ltp.text 'loaichungchi', ltp.VALUE 'loaichungchiVAL', ltp.textEn 'loaichungchiEn', t.`hinhscan`, hscan.full_path 'hscanName' , hscan.name 'hscanDownName' from ${jdbc.schema}.sea_chungchithuyenvien t left join (select * from ${jdbc.schema_02}.tab_lov lt1 where lt1.code like 'TV001') lt on (t.tenchungchiVAL = lt.VALUE) left join (select * from ${jdbc.schema_02}.tab_lov lt2 where lt2.code like 'TV003') ltp on (lt.PARENTID = ltp.id) left join ${jdbc.schema}.sea_thongtinthuyenvien tv on t.thuyenvienID = tv.id left join ${jdbc.schema}.tab_file hscan on t.`hinhscan` = hscan.id where t.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${jdbc.schema}.sea_chungchithuyenvien (tungay,denngay, hinhscan, tenchungchiVAL,so, thuyenvienID) VALUES ( str_to_date( #{tungay} , '%d/%m/%Y' ) , str_to_date( #{denngay} , '%d/%m/%Y' ) , #{hinhCertificate}, #{tenchungchiVAL}, #{so}, #{thuyenvienId} )
mapper.select: select t.`id`, t.`chucdanhId`, t.`thuyenvienId`, t.`tungay`, t.`denngay`, t.`ghichu`, t.`ngaytao`, t.`nguoitaoId`, t.`ngaycapnhat`, t.`nguoicapnhatId`, lt.text 'chucdanh' from ${jdbc.schema}.sea_thongtinchucdanh t left join ${jdbc.schema_02}.tab_lov lt on (lt.code like 'TV002' and t.chucdanhId = lt.VALUE) where t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ${jdbc.schema}.sea_thongtinchucdanh (chucdanhId, denngay, ghichu, thuyenvienId, tungay) values ( #{chucdanhId}, str_to_date( #{denngay} , '%d/%m/%Y' ), #{ghichu}, #{thuyenvienId}, str_to_date( #{tungay} , '%d/%m/%Y' ) )
